SVGAttributeWord-spacing.summary: The word-spacing attribute specifies spacing behavior between words.

remarks.para: If a length is provided without a unit identifier (e.g. an unqualified number such as 128), the browser processes the <length> as a width value in the current user coordinate system.
If a <length> is provided with one of the unit identifiers (e.g. .25em or 1%), then the browser converts the <length> into a corresponding value in the current user coordinate system.

blockquote.para: Note: As a presentation attribute, word-spacing can be used as a CSS property. See the word-spacing property for more information.
